detail_desc: Sandals with open sides and toes and crossover straps at the front. Imitation leather insoles.
Knitted cotton jumper with a reflective print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Welt chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.

Block-coloured satin bomber jacket with embroidered patches front and back, a striped, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, welt side pockets, an inner pocket and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt with a motif.
High-waisted leggings in glossy jersey with covered elastication at the waist.

Oversized jacket in woven fabric with reflective trims on the yoke and sleeves. High stand-up collar, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a drawstring at the waist with plastic cord locks. Bellows pockets with a flap and press-stud at the front. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that are doubled at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Hipster briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a rib knit with a V-neck front and back, fitted bodice and pleats in the skirt to create width.
Sleeveless, fitted jersey dress with a round neckline with decorative stones. Seam at the waist and a knee-length skirt with a slit at the back of the hem.
Leggings in soft jersey with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Short, flared skirt in sturdy jersey with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Double-layered waistband and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with long raglan sleeves and jacquard-knit details. Seamless.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Suede boots with warm faux fur linings, cotton twill insoles and patterned soles.
Cold shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with a raw roll edge at the top, narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hat in a fine-knit cotton blend with decorative rabbit ears on top, a ribbed hem and a strap with hook and loop fastening under the chin. Cotton jersey lining.

Biker jacket with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a small decorative flap front pocket and long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved tunic in jersey with a slight sheen. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Imitation leather slides with a metal appliqué and crossover straps at the front. Imitation leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Sandals with covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a round metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.

Straight-cut coat in an Italian wool blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, welt front pockets and an inner pocket with a button. Lined.
Plastic hair claws. Width 2.5 cm.
Pyjamas in soft fabric. Long-sleeved top with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Jersey bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Cardigan in sturdy organic cotton jersey with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Sandals in imitation suede with straps over the foot and ribbed elastic around the heel. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels, 6.5 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey in various designs with press-studs down the front that continue along one leg. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Stretch leggings with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, sewn-on decorative bow at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft stretch fabric with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Straight-cut vest top in a viscose weave with a scalloped edge and broderie anglaise at the hem.

Fitted lace body with a V-neck and wide, flounced trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Seam at the hips, below which is a jersey section with press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front.
Loose-knit, hole-patterned jumper with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Wide waist panel.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Suede thigh boots with pointed toes and a soft shaft with a half-zip in the side. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Cold shoulder dress in jersey with smocking at the top, wide shoulder straps, short sleeves and a flared skirt.
Cap with a print motif and appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
A-line dress in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and cap sleeves. Lined.
Imitation leather jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and quilted sections on the shoulders. Chest pocket and front pockets, both with zips. Lined.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Knee-length, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam and flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, wrapover hood, ribbed cuffs and straight-cut hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover shawl collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. A pair of earrings made from recycled metal with coral-shaped pendants decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Length approx. 5.5 cm.

Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend. Hat with faux fur pompom on top and ear flaps with ties. Mittens (sizes 0-6 months without thumbs) with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Scalloped edge around the neckline, down the button band and at the cuffs.

Sandals in imitation suede with covered heels. Wide elastic straps at the top, a foot strap at the front and a zip in the heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 11 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Short, padded jacket woven in a cotton blend with a stand-up collar that is ribbed on the inside and a zip and press-studs down the front. Side pockets and a sleeve pocket with a concealed zip, one inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Leggings in sturdy jersey with sewn-in creases at the front and back and small slits at the front. Wide waist panel in soft cotton jersey for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the leggings is partly recycled.
Nursing poncho in a soft fine knit containing some wool. Open at one side for easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders.
Lace thong briefs with a lined gusset and string back.
Fitted jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a long sleeves, a polo neck with a roll edge at the top, and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Leggings in sturdy, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide, foldover panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top, narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline and a tie-detail at the front of the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
